about_the_game:
The three-person crew of the spaceship Glitched Lightning was left stranded on Gallas II after their command ship was destroyed. All they have left now are their survival skills and the resources aboard their damaged frigate.

Help Kali, Heather, and Jenna explore hostile planets and assemble the raw materials to upgrade their ship and make the journey home in this first-person 3D science fiction RPG with crafting elements.

Explore alien worlds, battle alien monsters, and gather resources to repair and upgrade your ship. With luck and a lot of innovation, one day you may be able to make the long voyage home.

Twenty star systems await our heroes, ranging from worlds of ice, to lava, to asteroid belts, to stations orbiting uninhabitable worlds. Each system could hold some valuable material or technology to help them on their way, or just harbor terrible creatures that want to eat them. Many have both.

NOTE: This game is undergoing conversion from top-down 2D graphics to a first-person 3D dungeon crawler. Solward, featuring the same characters in the intended style, will be releasing first.
